product_metadata.plan_type: Non-linked, Non-participating, Individual Immediate Annuity Plan
product_metadata.key_positioning: Simple retirement income plan with guaranteed annuity + ROP on death

product_summary.objective: Saral Pension provides guaranteed lifelong annuity income immediately after purchase. It ensures pension payments throughout life and returns the full purchase price to nominee on death, offering both retirement security and legacy protection.
key_highlights: Annuity starts from next month (monthly mode)
Return of Purchase Price paid to nominee on death
Joint life option available with spouse continuation
Liquidity allowed on diagnosis of critical illness

plan_variants.variant_name: Option A: Life Annuity with Return of Purchase Price (ROP) on death
plan_variants.death_rule: Purchase price returned to nominee on death

plan_variants.variant_name: Option B: Joint Life Last Survivor with 100% spouse annuity + ROP on death of last survivor
plan_variants.payout_rule: Annuity payable to annuitant for life, then continues 100% to spouse
plan_variants.death_rule: Purchase price returned to nominee after death of last survivor

core_benefits.details: Regular annuity instalments are payable throughout life as per chosen frequency.
core_benefits.income_start: Next month onwards for monthly mode

core_benefits.details: On death, the purchase price is returned to nominee (Option A) or on death of last survivor (Option B).
Spouse receives 100% of annuity amount after annuitant’s death.

loan_facility.details: Policy provides liquidity through loan facility (refer Loan & Surrender section).

critical_illness_liquidity.details: Policy can be surrendered if annuitant/spouse/children diagnosed with listed critical illnesses.

surrender_rules.condition: Only allowed on diagnosis of listed critical illness
surrender_rules.surrender_value: 95% of Purchase Price minus outstanding loan and interest

sample_illustrations.note: Option B assumes spouse female of same entry age

compliance_guardrails.guaranteed_income_disclaimer: Annuity payouts are guaranteed for life based on purchase price and annuity option chosen.
compliance_guardrails.option_lock: Annuity option once chosen cannot be changed during policy term.
compliance_guardrails.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits are subject to prevailing laws.
compliance_guardrails.free_look_period: As per policy terms and IRDAI regulations.
termination_clause: Policy terminates on death of annuitant (Option A) or last survivor (Option B)

retrieval_chunks.text: Saral Pension offers only Option A (Single Life with ROP) and Option B (Joint Life 100% spouse annuity + ROP).
Purchase Price is returned to nominee on death (Option A) or death of last survivor (Option B).
Policy can be surrendered after 6 months only if annuitant/spouse/children diagnosed with listed critical illnesses. Surrender value = 95% of purchase price.
Annuity frequency can be changed at any anniversary with conversion factors: monthly 0.0805, quarterly 0.243, half-yearly 0.491.
Entry age allowed from 40 to 80 years. Minimum annuity installment is ₹1,000 monthly or ₹12,000 yearly.
